revised_title: Researches on the Foraminifera: Peneroplis, Operculina, and Amphistegina
tldr: The author examines the structure and classification of three genera of foraminifera, Peneroplis, Operculina, and Amphistegina, and discusses their external characteristics, internal organization, and geographical distribution. The study reveals the wide range of variation within Peneroplis and the close relationship between Operculina and Amphistegina.
